twitch_info.title: I wanna kill the kamilia 3 - Secret 5 - Attempts - PB: Screen 9 of 9 (vid 3)

message.body: Do you like exploring hidden areas
Yeah, I know that but I'm curious what context that statement is in.
Cause honestly I'm doing secret areas in K3 cause I'm working on 100%.
I'm not sure if I'd even bother otherwise.
It's me asking you the question in stream chat while you grind secret 5.
Also highly depends on the game honestly.
That's such an insane costume to make as well.
my bad, i mean good luc
also why not save inside the secret
why did the song reset twice though
To escape room and reset on the same frame
Reset the music, so that in the clear video you will hear it from music start.
honestly Iforget about it after a while
I get used to the restarting music
So used to failing to screen 8 at this point honestly
It's just become a counter I increment every time without caring about it.
and screen 7 just isn't even worth noting down
twitch suddenly dropping my frames like that
30 attempts at screen 8, only 1 at screen 9
Max had 44 attempts at screen 8 and like 4 attempts at screen 9 lul
I'm about to do more screen 8 attempts than him and not reach screen 9
you're here for the last couple hours of the grind before I have to do more tomorrow
well luck isn't something I get
I wish I did get it tho
I gives you luck then xD
I love how I cancel mid-air with numpad out of sheer boredom on the first screen.
Part of me wonders if the devs even cleared this
I like the idea of secret 5
but that's all it has got going for it lmao
I've lost trakc of all sense of time when it comes to grinding this now tbh
Lmao bin there doubt the devs thought youd have any willpower left by this point xD
This level of willpower is not shared by everyone xD
not everyone grinds 10 hours a day every day on a secret
which is precisely what I've done wit this
or at least as close as I can get to 10 hours before bed anyway
only breaks have been when I physically can't continue
15 more attempts at screen 8 and I'll surpass max's total for screen8 attempts.
That's the only noteworthy detail at this point.
another 30 hours to go until clear I guess
something tells I'm not getting it tonight
which means I'm phenomenally behind schedule
every time I hope I got nowhere as well
hope and luck don't exist - oh hiya. Just failing miserably at secret 5 :D
Much harder than 1.50 version I take it :o
thank God i first tried platform
Is the platform rng similar to 1.50?
If so first trying platform is actually easy
I don't have any experience with 1.30, so I don't know.
Still with ya just getting my ID dealt with xD
feels like I've been on secret 5 forever tbh
but tbf it is about to be 30+ hours grind
Only what the 3rd or 4th day xD
if you were grinding 10 hours a day you'd feel the same lmao
you think I might get it in 80 hours?
Heres hoping its not that bad xD
I understand why Max felt like he'd never beat it, during grinds now.
I'm changing my estimate from 60+ to 80+ hours
left to right isn't as bad today
today right side is the bad one
explains why I didn't clear today
but yeah this explains everything lmao
is what I need to od in a run
Putting the stream on my computer xD
This isall highly necessary practice imo
man see, now I'm getting better
I need this to be far more consistent if I wish to clear
I wonder if I should just grind out in jtool for a while
if it means clearing I see no harm
I think I need to grind it out in jtool a ton
until I finally can clear on the re gular
Only then can I imagine myself winning in the real game at this point
cause right now I'm grinding without purpose
the same slog of 1-6 screens then die on 7th screen
youll get over it soon im sure
I think that's 3 clears in tjool now
slowly getting over my barrier though.
This is soo much better than last night
That would've been another screen 9 attempt
There's a very specific way of handling thid
getting that last jump down eh
waiting to see the fruits of my labour still lel
think thats another one of those words
they spell differently depending on where you live :P
screen 6 is the most garbage screen in this secret
been stuck on this secret for so long, I don't even know what I'll think wehn I clear anymore
It's like having a carrot on a stick
and you're a pig chasing it
I'm as close as I was 2 days ago.
which is still pretty close lmao
reaching and clearing screen 9 have a massive gap between them
fun-fact I've also pulled a max
reaching screen 9 and then never getting back there for like forever.
when I have an omega thick beard
hope and wishful thinking died a long time ago.
my expectations are now rock bottom
nowhere to go but up right XD
I haven't had a screen 9 attempt in two days lmao
and then tomorrow is another whole day of just this
right now my entire life has become secret 5 LUL
mine has been observe the madlad in his natural habitat :D
secret 5 is really the sort of thing nobody should do
totally water totem time for me :P
nobody s hould do secret 5 lmao
something you guys managed to share with canada :P
Though in this caseI have a very good reason to complain
close to making progress or having the chance too
"WHAT THE FUCK WERE THE DEVS THINKING?!"
fun-fact, this has taken me longer than tempest crystal, and if this continues tomorrow, longer than guy tower crystal.
guy tower is the longest grind I've done since timemachine 2 lunatic
but he were are, about to match that again.
so when does it get hard.
I've already taken longer than max in terms of time spent.
it happens im sure you got em beat in other areas
30 minutes to an hour he spent
and I spent 2 minutes to get it
but other than that one area
I've done consistently worse than max
still better than Ill ever do :P
tricky control swaps make it so bad
I mea the controls are still the same
It's just executing it in reverse
I guess flipped is more the word
just like soulcaliber I cant do right side
been lurking, gl with the grind!
thanks! Will be ending for tonight in 5-10 minutes mostlikely
how long have you been going for this?
was asking total, but hope you can get this
If I end up grinding for another 10+ hours tomorrow, then I'll have surpassed how long guy tower crystal took me. LUL
This is honestly so much harder than guy tower & tempest crystals combined.
I got a feeling ill be getting a secret 5 clear vid sometime tomorrow :D
Even if this doesn't take me longer than gtc
gtc was only hard because of jump refresher save
but this is hard on 3 screens
this is a soon tm moment
gonna give it a couple more attempts
